DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to investigate the clinical outcomes of surgical correction of foot deformity with the MFB in a larger group of patients with neurological impairment of the foot.
DOC.brief_title: A Retrospective Study to Assess the Outcome After Surgical Reconstruction of the Midfoot With the Midfoot Fusion Bolt in Patients With Neuroarthropathy
DOC.criteria: Age â‰¥ 18 at date of inclusion Previous surgical reconstruction of the midfoot with Midfoot Fusion Bolt(s) for one of the following indications: Neuroarthropathy Deformity of the foot with neurological impairment Signed informed consent according to local regulation Prisoner at date of inclusion
